Title: Chosen
Plot: Angel arrives with an amulet which may be a weapon against the First. The battle-lines are drawn and the gang spends the night preparing for the final confrontation. A confrontation that some may not survive. Armed with an amulet they know nothing about, a scythe which holds the key to the Slayer line, and magicks which they may not be able to control, they prepare to face the assembled armies of the First Evil.
GuestStars: Mary Wilcher, Demetra Raven, Katie Gray, Lisa Ann Cabasa, Ally Matsumura, Kelli Wheeler, Jenna Edwards, Julia Ling
